id.description: Primary unique number that represents this effect. For additional IDs that represent the same effect, check `variantIds`

icon.description: URL of the image file as provided by ArenaNet

stacking.description: Whether the effect stacks in duration or intensity

maximum.description: How many total intensity stacks can be applied at once or the maximum duration in seconds depending on stacking type

description.description: Additional text that provides an explanation for the effect

type.description: Specific categorization of the effect, which indicates how it is applied and what other properties that it may have

variantIds.description: Additional unique IDs for effects that are essentially duplicates of the main one

trait.description: ID of the trait that applies this effect

specialization.description: ID of the specialization that contains the related trait

skill.description: ID of the skill that applies this effect

professions.description: Which professions can use the related skill

specialization.description: ID of the specialization that is required to use the related skill

slot.description: Where the related skill fits into
